div.p: Query definition for all gender codes

definitions.add:
npgsql
SELECT cd_id AS key, val AS label, lang_cs as language FROM cd_set_mem_assoc_tbl INNER JOIN cd_name_tbl USING (cd_id) WHERE set_id = 'e9eecd3c-7b80-47f9-9cb6-55c8d3110fb0' AND lang_cs = ${language}

fbsql
SELECT uuid_to_char(cd_id) AS key, val AS label, lang_cs as language FROM cd_set_mem_assoc_tbl INNER JOIN cd_name_tbl USING (cd_id) WHERE set_id = char_to_uuid('e9eecd3c-7b80-47f9-9cb6-55c8d3110fb0') AND lang_cs = ${language}

sqlite
SELECT concept_uuid AS id, concept_name.value AS label, language FROM concept_concept_set INNER JOIN concept_name USING (concept_uuid) WHERE concept_set_uuid = X'3CCDEEE9807BF9479CB655C8D3110FB0' AND "language" = ${language}
